questions.uddipok:
Change the sentences according to directions:

(a) Health is wealth. (Make complex sentence)

(b) A healthy poor man is happier than a sick moneyed man. (Use positive degree)

(c) Though a healthy man is an asset to his family, an unhealthy man is a liability. (Make compound sentence)

(d) He can succeed in life. (Make interrogative sentence)

(e) So, everybody cannot but be conscious of his health. (Make affirmative sentence)

(f) Everybody must take care of his health all the time. (Make negative sentence)

(g) Health can be improved by regular physical exercise and a balanced diet. (Use active voice)

(h). The people who are poor cannot afford to take a balanced diet. (Make simple sentence)

(i) They are very concerned with the quantity of food. (Make exclamatory)

(j) Everybody : should know it that malnutrition causes' weakness. (Use passive voice)

sub_questions.explanation:
(a) It is health which is wealth.

(b) A sick moneyed man is not so happy as a healthy poor man.

(c) A healthy man is an asset to his family but an unhealthy man is a liability.

(d) Can't he succeed in life?

(e) So, everybody must be conscious of his health.

(f) Everybody cannot but take care of his health all the time.

(g) Regular physical exercise and a balanced diet can improve health./We can improve health by regular physical exercise and a balance diet.

(h) Poor people/The poor cannot afford to take a balanced diet.

(i) How concerned they are with the quantity of food!

(j) It should be known to everybody that weakness is caused by malnutrition./That weakness is caused by malnutrition should be known to everybody.

questions.uddipok: Suppose, on the last vacation you were going to Rajshahi by bus. Unfortunately your bus met with an accident but luckily there was no casualty or death. Now, write a paragraph on "Causes of Road Accidents in Bangladesh."

sub_questions.explanation:
Causes and Effects of Road Accident

Road accident has become a daily occurrence in our country. It has increased in number considerably in recent years. The real causes of road accidents lie with the, people and not with the mechanised means of transport. Reckless driving and overtaking tendency of the drivers are responsible for most of the accidents. The drivers drive their motorised vehicles at breakneck speed. Sometimes, they lose control over steering that leads to accidents. Violation of traffic rales by both the pedestrians and the drivers also causes road accidents. The situation becomes worse when the slow-moving rickshaws and carts tussle with cars, buses and trucks. In some cities, roads are too narrow and inadequate. These can hardly cope with the ever-increasing volume of traffic. Mechanical failures, including faulty brakes and bald tyres also result in fatal açcidents. Every year, thousands of people die and many more get injured in road accidents. Sometimes, the injured have to embrace disability forever. Road accidents also cause material losses including waste of money for the treatment of the injured and repairing the vehicles. The consequences of road accident leave a lasting impact on the individuals and their family. In the long run, a road accident affects the economy of the country: Road accidents have become a great menace in our society. Stern steps must be taken to check this danger. Spacious roads should be constructed and traffic signals should be set up at the key points. Heavy penalty should be imposed on those who violate the traffic rules. Moreover, common people should be made aware of the traffic rules through radio, television, newspapers and posters. If the city administrations work sincerely, the number of road accidents is sure to come down.

questions.uddipok: Nowadays, people are suffering from various diseases. If they take physical exercise everyday, they can enjoy a sound health. Now, write a composition on "The Importance of Physical Exercise".

sub_questions.explanation:
The Importance of Physical Exercise Or, Physical Exercise
Physical exercise means the movement of the limbs and organs of our body according to rules. Physical exercise is essential for sound health because it helps our body to be active. By taking regular physical exercise, we can keep ourselyes fit.

There are different kinds of exercises like free hand exercises, yoga, weight lifting, gymnastics, acrobatics and so on. Free hand exercises help one to get sound health. Weight lifting is for professional players. Walking is good for all. For the children, 'running, swimming and playing ordinary games are suitäble. The importance of physical exercise in our practical life is great. It helps us to build a sound body. It helps us to keep away from diseases. It is immensely helpful for sound mind in a sound body. However, anything excessive is bad. One should take exercises following the rules with proper diet and rest, otherwise he will suffer.

In our country, some peoplé do not take physical exercise. They think that it is unnecessary and mere killing of time. But, in fact, they are wrong. By taking physical exercise, we can remain healthy and do our respective jobs propérly. Without physical exercise, our health breaks down ánd we suffer from various diseases and complications. We should take exercise according to our age and condition of our body. Then we can be benefited easily from every kind' of exercise.

Physical exercise is necessary to build a nation. Healthy children are the healthy citizens of the future. So, we should all take physical exercise regularly as a part and parcel of our daily life to live a healthy and happy life.
